name: StackWatchers - slimmed down layout
description:
Simplifies StackOverflow and StackExchange:
  • Removes the distracting sidebar (no more procrastination)
  • Narrows down the page a bit to nicely fit the half of a 1920px screen.
  • Enlarges the search box a bit for a better search experience.
additional_info: Works on all stackoverflow.com, stackexchange.com and superuser.com domains. AFAIK. Please report problems to codestaila@codeministry.ch
